content.prompt: The emergence of the “Ragged Schools” in London best reflects which of the following developments?

choices.label: The increasing use of public education to promote nationalism
The growth of charitable institutions addressing urban problems
The emergence of labor-based political advocacy groups
The development of mass-based political parties as advocates for social reform

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
